origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinanceData.get_industry_cost', 'description': 'Get the operational cost data of a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cost_data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing operational cost data of the industry.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceData.search_practical_cases', 'description': 'Search for practical cases based on keywords.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'keywords', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Keywords to search for in the practical cases.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cases', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing information about matching practical cases.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceData.get_market_share', 'description': 'Get the market share of companies in a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'num_companies', 'type': 'INTEGER', 'description': 'Number of companies to retrieve market share for.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_share', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing market share data of companies.'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceData.get_policy_adjustments', 'description': 'Get recent policy adjustments of a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry name.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_adjustments', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing recent policy adjustments of the industry.'}]}]
我准备分析量化投资在交通运输行业的应用。首先，获取交通运输行业的运营成本数据。然后，查找五篇关于交通运输量化投资的实践经验。接着，分析八家运输企业的市场占有率。最后，获取交通运输行业的政策调整信息。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取交通运输行业的运营成本数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'industry'的值是什么?

prediction: 参数'industry'的值是"交通运输行业"。
